nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+- hosts: prod
+  become: yes
+  tasks:
+    - name: Set the hostname
+      hostname:
+         name: st.unicode.org

nodes.bodyText:
Yes! I hunted around for a way to get the "current" host, but didn't find this. I'll make a follow-up PR with that change, thanks!
I don't know if there's any reason to do the same for other hosts (like smoketest), so I limited it to "prod"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+- hosts: prod
+  become: yes
+  tasks:
+    - name: Set the hostname
+      hostname:
+         name: st.unicode.org

nodes.bodyText: nginx-exporter wasn't in the ubuntu version we have yet.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,180 @@
+- hosts: surveytool
+  become: yes
+  vars_files:
+    - vars/main.yml
+    - local-vars/local.yml
+  roles:
+    - { role: geerlingguy.mysql }
+    - { role: geerlingguy.nginx }
+  tasks:

+      apt:
